string.Data: "Looks like you're using holiday alarms.This feature needs to connect to the internet to work normally. Before using this feature, you must agree to our User Agreement and Privacy Policy. Agree?"

resources.string: "Clock isn't allowed to connect to the internet to update the info about holidays. Holiday alarms will go off on Saturday and Sunday."

resources.string: "Clock isn't allowed to connect to the internet to update the info about holidays. Weekday alarms will go off from Monday to Friday. Holiday alarms will go off on Saturday and Sunday."
"Clock isn't allowed to connect to the internet to update the info about working days. Weekday alarms will go off from Monday to Friday."

"Alarm will go off if it's set for at least 10 minutes after you power off your device"
Sleep data provided by Xiaomi Health
Most people need 7 to 9 hours of sleep per night
Switch to DND mode until you wake up
Start tracking your sleep to view stats
Turn on to start recording sleep data

Sleep tracking functionality is provided by Xiaomi Health. Once turned on, Xiaomi Health automatically records your sleep based on your phone usage, activity stats, as well as fall asleep and wake up time you set, showing you stats in the form of charts. To track sleep more accurately, allow Xiaomi Health to autostart. All the related data will be stored locally on your device, which allows you to manage it easily.
Your stats will appear here after Xiaomi Health analyzes enough data
Allow this app to connect to the internet to access all its features.
